content.title: The Young Crab and His Mother
content.text:
A crab said to her son, Why do you walk so one-sided, my child? It is far more becoming to go straight forward.

The young Crab replied: Quite true, dear Mother; and if you will show me the straight way, I will promise to walk in it. The Mother tried in vain, and submitted without remonstrance to the reproof of her child.
content.moral: Example is more powerful than precept.
